script.name: Lib.Cmd.Anarkis.DockAll.ADSonly
script.description: Lib - Dock all ships to a target

line.comment: * Securely Dock All Ships to a Carrier / Station
* LU Update (Solarahawk): removed check for and cancellation of legacy hullcheck task; no longer relevant
* - - Don't touch ships in different sector or they'll go sluggish
* - - Teleport ships with transporter device (or when OOS)
* - - Same for OOS at smaller distance to avoid rare bug
* - - - Go Idle and hope it'll work next try

sval.val: Lib - Dock all ships to a target
Securely Dock All Ships to a Carrier / Station
LU Update (Solarahawk): removed check for and cancellation of legacy hullcheck task; no longer relevant
- - Don't touch ships in different sector or they'll go sluggish
- - Teleport ships with transporter device (or when OOS)
- - Same for OOS at smaller distance to avoid rare bug
- - - Go Idle and hope it'll work next try
